data.title: Barça, Madrid and Atlético show 'solidarity' with Osasuna with Super Cup revenues
data.meta_description: The RFEF has decided to act of preventive way and finally has arrived to an agreement so that the three 'big' of the Supercopa could collaborate of direct way in the income of Osasuna
data.text:
The Real Federation Spain of Football (RFEF) has decided to converse with FC Barcelona, Real Madrid and Athletic of Madrid to arrive to an agreement with the three more important clubs of LaLiga in the last decade and that they could yield part of his income to Osasuna. Like this, the RFEF can avoid any type of conflict, something that remained in evidence when Valencia decided to report that in past editions no all the teams agreed with the economic distribution.

Like this it has explained it 'Mark' this Tuesday, aiming that finally the three teams mentioned accessed and have finished delivering part of his booty, delivering 200.000 euros each one for the Osasuna. Of this way, the money that goes to carry the club navarro surpasses the million of euros, quantity that is above the distribution assigned of official way.

This figure will remain to fault to know of what can attain the group rojillo on the terrain of game, where will confront to the Barça this Thursday in the semifinals and could increase in one million more in case to be finalist and two 'kilos' more if it wins the Supercopa. It is necessary to remember that the distribution comes of the hand of the titles attained by each team, that is to say, sportive results, the television audiences and the value that the clubs have in the current distribution of audiovisual rights.

The money for Barça and Madrid reduces slightly
